新的囊性纤维化新生儿筛查指南的旨在公平检测美国囊性纤维化基金会发布了有关囊性纤维化（CF）新生儿筛查的第一个指南，以改善来自所有种族和种族背景的婴儿的CF及时检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-cystic-fibrosis-newborn-newborn-screening-guidelines-aim-for-quitable-quitable-quitable-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-cystic-fibrosis-newborn-screening-guidelines-guidelines-aim-for-quitable-quitable-quitable-quitable-quitable-qualtection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9384fc08-c18d-416f-b945-3b1060e861d0 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 03:04:15 -0400 New cystic fibrosis newborn screening guidelines aim for equitable detection
小鼠和器官模型揭示了FGFR2在胰腺癌攻击和拦截中的作用预计到2030年，胰腺癌被预计将成为最严重的癌症。到了诊断时，通常很难治疗。因此，对于个人患者和普通人群而言，抗击胰腺癌的战斗可能就像是一场与时间的比赛。冷春港实验室（CSHL）教授兼癌症中心主任戴维·图维森（David Tuveson）提供了一个明显的类比： https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/mouse-and-organoid-models-models-reveal-fgfr2s-role-in-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-aggression-aggression-anggression-angerception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/mouse-and-organoid-models-models-reveal-fgfr2s-role-in-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-aggression-anggression-anggression-ang-interception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f39E81FB-14C9-4C9-4EF7-B7E6-E9D572CDFBB4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:48:54 -0400 Mouse and organoid models reveal FGFR2's role in pancreatic cancer aggression and interception
卵巢癌中对CDK4/6抑制剂的抗性卵巢癌是妇科恶性肿瘤中死亡的主要原因，预后较差且5年生存率较低，因此需要采取新的治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/unraveling-resistance-to-cdk46-in--in--in--in--in--in--in-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/unraveling-resistance-to-cdk46-in--in--in--in--in--in--in-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39b8e24A-9569-495E-BFFC-1B474B91875A Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:28:37 -0400 Unraveling resistance to CDK4/6 inhibitors in ovarian cancer
宫颈动脉解剖住院的种族和年龄差异颈动脉解剖是颈部动脉的撕裂，可为大脑提供血液。这样的撕裂会导致血块引起中风。一项新的研究发现，在15年内，美国宫颈动脉解剖的住院数量将近五倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/racial-and-age-disparities-in-cervical-artery-artery-dissection-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/racial-and-age-disparities-in-cervical-artery-artery-dissection-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f39d8ad9-55b5-4aa5-4aa5-8712-ae333e51f4a4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:18:46 -0400 Racial and age disparities in cervical artery dissection hospitalizations
癌症药物设计的新结构和机械理解爱荷华大学领导的一项研究揭示了DNA修复蛋白RAD52所采用的意外结构，因为它结合并保护了分裂细胞中的复制DNA。对RAD52-DNA复合物的新结构和机械理解可以帮助研究人员开发新的抗癌药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-structural-and-mechanistic-mechanistic-underding-for-cancer-drug-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-structural-and-mechanistic-mechanistic-mechanisting-for-for-cancer-drug-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96361f0a-e29a-46dd-b86a-145a31280894 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:10:22 -0400 New structural and mechanistic understanding for cancer drug design
与欧洲相比，财富不平等驱动美国死亡率更高研究人员将美国的财富和生存率与欧洲的财富率与欧洲的人进行了比较，在十年的时间里，所有财富水平的美国人比欧洲同行更有可能死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/wealth-inequality-inequality-inequality-drives-higher-us-us-mortality-compary-compared-compared-to-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/wealth-inequality-inequality-inequality-drives-higher-us-us-mortality-compary-compared-compared-to-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=179f3368-1EC3-4F5B-A427-227E087C38F6 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:58:43 -0400 Wealth inequality drives higher US mortality compared to Europe
遗传研究为患有罕见肠道疾病的儿童提供了希望进一步的基因检测将表明，索菲（Sophie）具有一组罕见疾病，称为代码（先天性腹泻和肠病），会破坏细胞在肠道中的功能，导致腹泻，并防止婴儿吸收他们成长和繁殖所需的营养素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/genetic-research-creach-forers-hope-for-children-with-rare-intestinal-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/genetic-creachearch-crearch-forers-hope-for-children-with-rare-intestinal-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4df108ED-8021-4445-A283-9F16A136B330 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:47:57 -0400 Genetic research offers hope for children with rare intestinal disorders
